item.description:
The professional bull riders are coming to New England. Up and coming riders and bull riding veterans will compete riding some of the toughest "animal athletes" in the sport. We are sure to see some spectacular rides along with a few wrecks.
Afterwards join us for some skee ball, video games and dinner at Dave and Busters. If you plan to come for dinner, sign up separately.

There are several garages for parking nearby.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us outside the main entrance.
item.name: Rodeo Sunday
